text:
Application for Experienced professional recruitment
 
BALAMURUGAN SERAN SENGUTTUVAN
BALAMURUGAN SERAN SENGUTTUVAN
TESTING AND COMMISSIONING ENGINEER 
Email: balamurugan.seran@gmail.com
Contact No: +91 9551204517
Contact Address
106/221 Suriya Narayanan Street,
Royapuram,
Chennai  600013.
CAREER PROFILE
Objective

With a strong belief in the saying Ability develops and reveals itself with every new assignment, I would
be glad to work in a competitive environment helping me to explore my ability and potential to the best in
turn contributing to the growth of the organization.
Profile Summary
Previous Organization : Sodexo India Pvt. Ltd.
Designation : Floor Maintenance Engineer
Period : From October 2011 to January 2013
 Current Organization : PDCS PROJECTS INDIA Pvt. Ltd.
Designation : Testing And Commissioning Engineer
Period : From April 2013 To July 2016
Nature Of Work 

Testing and commissioning of all kind of protective relays of ALSTOM, ABB and SCHNEIDER make.

Design and making of settings calculations for protection relays.

Testing and commissioning of all Electrical equipments in 11KV, 33KV, 66KV, 220KV, 400KV and 765KV
systems.

Inspection of Control and relay panel, preparation of test report and cable schedule for sub-station and
power plant.

Testing and Commissioning of Control and Relay panel for Bus bar, Transformer, Generator, Motor, Bus
coupler and Line Feeder.

Knowledge of Transformer protection, Reactor protection, Busbar protection, Motor protection and
Synchronizing Scheme.

Testing of Power Control Centre and Motor Control Centre.

Testing of CT, VT, CVT, Circuit Breaker, Switch Gear and Power Transformer.

Trouble shooting of all Electrical Circuits, Control Circuits and Protection Circuits.
 
Domestic Assignment For Power Plants And Substations 
1.
Testing and Commissioning of 400/220KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for RRVPNL at Bikaner, Rajasthan.
2.
Testing and Commissioning of 400/220KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for RRVPNL at Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.
3.
Testing and commissioning of 60MW Power station, testing of Line feeder relays and Motor protection
relays of ALSTOM and Siemens for TCPL at Karaikudi, Tamilnadu.
4.
Testing and commissioning of 33/6.6KV Switchgear, PMCC panel scheme checking and testing of P&B
Vision relay for feeder protection and Bus coupler for FLSmidth at Asansol, West Bengal.
5.
Testing and commissioning of 33KV /415V Switchgear, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and

Andhra Pradesh.
6.
Testing and commissioning of 200MW Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing

7.
Testing and Commissioning of 7MW Solar Power plant , RMU panel scheme checking and testing of CT,

8.
Testing and Commissioning of 765/400 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and

9.
Testing and Commissioning of 220 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing
of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for MSETCL at Akola, Maharashtra.
10. Testing and Commissioning of 400/220 KV Substation , Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder and transformer feeder relays of ALSTOM for MSETCL at Ghatodi , Maharashtra.
11. Testing and Commissioning of 400/220 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and

Maharashtra.
12. Testing and commissioning of 60MW Power station, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing

13. Testing and Commissioning of 200MW Thermal Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking

14. Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation, Control and Relay panel scheme modification and

15. Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation, Control and Relay panel scheme modification and

17. Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation , Control and Relay panel scheme modification and

20. Testing and commissioning of 765/400/220 KV PGCIL substation, control and relay panel scheme
- 2 -
checking and testing of Line, transformer and reactor relays of Schneider make for L&T India Ltd. At

24. Testing and commissioning of 1X600MW TPP, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing of

International Assignment For Substations & Power stations

Factory testing of KNPC SWG, Equipment testing of CT, PT, Bus bar & control and relay scheme checking,
function checking of feeder protection, motor protection, bus bar protection relays of SEL, ABB & Siemens
make relays for KNPC at AL-AHLEILA Factory at Kuwait.
